name: Extreme Motorbike Driving
description:
Get a quick approach to highway, gauge your driving speed Bike Race Game. Super motorbike racing is blended by gathering dynamic elements of real Bike race, challenging task for impassioned rider. The game is a simulator of genuine race battle.
Thrill and excitement are mixed up to arouse your senses to plunge in nonstop bike race adventure. Game. The simulator game concept is precisely designed for race lovers. Start your bike, speed it up, drift it through different roads, checkpoints and sharp turns.
To give a touch of reality, In this Xtrem Bike Race all integral components of real racing are actually organized like racing sound , bike, rider and the highway locations. The race have different stages which are locked and advancement of level connected with the success of previous level.

Features
• Real physical object and motorbike
• Best 3D graphic
• Dreamy adventure of Bike Race
• Super sound quality customize with mute
• Smooth Highway racing track
• Varied environment and climate
• Advancement of racing level

How to Play:
• Tilt for Control
• Go through into check points to complete the missions
• Drive Carefully
